page.title: 03PRINCIPAL FEATURES
page.content: PRINCIPAL FEATURES GEOGRAPHICALLY,THE AREA IS MAINLY MARSH,CULTIVATED GRASSLAND AND RESIDENTIAL AREAS,THE LATTER BEING APPROXIMATELY TWO SQUARE KILOMETRES. MANY PEOPLE RETIRE TO THIS REGION AND SO THERE IS A LARGER PROPORTION OF ELDERLY PEOPLE HERE THAN IS NORMAL. THE HOUSES ARE OFTEN LARGE WITH FOUR OR MORE BEDROOMS,AND SET IN SIZEABLE GARDENS.THEY ARE QUITE EXPENSIVE TO BUY,AND ATTRACT THE WELL-TO-DO: UNFORTUNATELY THEY ALSO ATTRACT BURGLARS,AND THERE IS A FAIRLY HIGH INCIDENCE OF BREAKING AND ENTERING. MANY RESIDENTS OWN THEIR OWN CARS,AND THIS PRECLUDES A VIABLY COMMERCIAL PUBLIC TRANSPORT SYSTEM,WHICH NECESSITATES MORE FOLK OWNING THEIR OWN TRANSPORT _A VICIOUS CIRCLE! IT ALSO MEANS THOSE WHO CANNOT AFFORD TO DO SO ARE LIMITED TO THE LOCALITY.
